forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow for the afternoon. High 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow for the afternoon. High 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow this evening will give way to lingering snow showers late. Low near 0C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow this evening will give way to lingering snow showers late. Low 32F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning transitioning to light rain in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High around 40F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 37F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 42F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 4C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 39F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High around 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 42F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 2C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 35F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 4C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low -1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 31F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy early. Then a mix of wintry precipitation expected late. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy early. Then a mix of wintry precipitation expected late. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
